# dataSource

**Instance Property**

The object that provides view controllers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var dataSource: (any UIPageViewControllerDataSource)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Methods of the data source are called in response to gesture-based navigation. If the value of this property is `nil`, then gesture-based navigation is disabled.

## Providing the Page Content

- **UIPageViewControllerDataSource**: The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewControllerDataSource] protocol is adopted by an object that provides view controllers to the page view controller on an as-needed basis, in response to navigation gestures.
